attributes.title: Lays Salt and Vinegar potato chips
attributes.description: Lays salt and vinegar potato chips are made by Frito Lay.
This is yet another potato farm that is made for Frito Lay. Sackett potatoes are not just made for Frito Lay, but they also make it for other companies.
attributes.address: 6500 North Lafayette Street, Greenville, MI 48838, USA
attributes.title: (2)Sackett potato farm

attributes.description:
Most of frito lay potato chips' potatoes are grown from the black gold farms with 12 farms across the USA. Black gold farms are one of Frito Lay's largest suppliers. 
Black gold farms are specifically grown for Frito Lay potato chips. But there are 80 local farmers from 27 states.
attributes.title: (1)Columbia Black gold farm

attributes.description: This is where they make the vinegar for the flavoring for the salt and vinegar chips.
attributes.address: 4801 South Oakley Avenue, Chicago, IL 60609, USA
attributes.title: (2)Fleischmann's Vinegar Company

attributes.description: This is one of the main Frito Lay factories in the US. There are many more Frito-Lay factories. All of the ingredients, flavoring and potatoes are sent here. The chips are packed here to be sent off to the stores.
attributes.title: (4)Kern Frito Lay Factory

attributes.description: Frito lays potato chips uses corn oil to fry their potato chips. This is where the corn is made to produce to oil.
attributes.title: (3)Corn farm

attributes.description: This is where the salt is made so it can be used to salt the chips. Not all of the salt is made here, but it is the main place where they get the salt.
attributes.title: (3)Detroit Salt mine
